titles.title: Bwana Pokea Sadaka (Our Lady of Guadalupe)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana Pokea sadaka,
tukutoleayo.
Bwana Mkate na divai,
twazileta kwako.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba pokea -
Bwana pokea sadaka.
(Baba pokea, ooh Baba)
Vyote ni mali yako,
vyote Baba upokee ni yako.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bwana Pokea sadaka,
tukutoleayo.
Kazi ya mikono yetu,
twaileta kwako.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana Pokea sadaka,
tukutoleayo.
Bwana mazao ya mashamba,
twayaleta kwako.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bwana Pokea sadaka,
tukutoleayo.
Fedha za mifuko yetu,
twazileta kwako.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bwana Pokea sadaka,
tukutoleayo.
Bwana na pia nafsi zetu,
twazileta kwako.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Bwana Pokea sadaka,
tukutoleayo.
Vyote tulivyo navyo Baba,
twavileta kwako.
